pkgmetadata.longdescription: Uncertainty Propagation for R Vectors // Support for measurement errors in R vectors, matrices and arrays: automatic uncertainty propagation and reporting. Documentation about 'errors' is provided in the paper by Ucar, Pebesma Azcorra (2018, doi:10.32614/RJ-2018-075), included in this package as a vignette; see 'citation("errors")' for details.
